Your Ultimate Fantasy Football Experience Starts Here

Are you ready to unleash your fantasy football legacy? Look no further! MyFantasyLeague is your go-to destination for all things fantasy football. Our advanced features set us apart, making us the top choice for fantasy football enthusiasts like you.

Why Choose MyFantasyLeague?

This is where the Commissioner’s play! We have hosted casual and expert leagues since the 90’s and have the most robust fantasy football league management system, period.

We support tons of incredible features that make your fantasy football experience a blast and that you won’t find on any other league management site.

League Types

From traditional redraft and auction leagues to keeper, dynasty, DFS and even guillotine leagues, we have you covered.

Commissioner Tools

Setup your dream league with more options than any other site, including custom scoring rules, roster settings options, waiver wire rules, and many more advanced commissioner tools

Discover the Benefits of MyFantasyLeague

We’re dedicated to providing the ultimate fantasy football experience. Our platform stands out with unparalleled customisation options.

Comprehensive League Management
Set up your 2024 Fantasy Football League online with our robust commissioner software.
Click here to start your free trial.
01
Free Trial
To get a comprehensive understanding of how our platform works, take a moment to set up a league now. There’s no obligation to purchase, and you can use it for free throughout the preseason.
Click here to start your free trial.
No credit card required.
02
League History
Track Franchise and League Records, such as cumulative head-to-head win-loss records, highest score of the year for all past seasons, widest margin of victory, highest scoring players at each position and much more.
We have a very comprehensive history of your league and no other site comes close.
03
Customisable Layouts
Customize your fantasy football league pages by creating your own:
  • Franchise logos
  • League logos
  • Icons
We can help you customize with our:
  • Logo templates
  • Over 950 helmets
04
Fantasy Football Playoffs
Set up playoff brackets for your fantasy football Super Bowl...and for the Toilet bowl if you like. View the fantasy football playoff bracket to see who advances and who has been eliminated until a champion is crowned!
05
Any Size League
Whether you have 8 teams or 32 teams, we can handle it. We support leagues of all sizes and configurations:
  • Up to 100 players per roster
  • Up to 100 teams
  • Up to 24 divisions
  • Up to 6 conferences
06
Dynasty Leagues
We were the first to offer Dynasty Leagues and continue to lead the industry in innovation. Our platform supports multi-year contracts, taxi squads, and rookie drafts.
07
Defensive Players
Our platform is one of the only ones that supports "True Position" for individual defensive players. In fact, our IDP positions are set in consultation with Gary Davenport, one of the leading experts on True Positions. You can also purchase his IDP rankings to help you with your draft and in-season roster management.
08
Flexible Waiver Options
Commissioners have complete control of the waiver wire to determine exactly how and when free agents can be selected each week, using these methods:
  • Blind Bidding
  • First Come, First Serve
  • Reverse Order of Standings
09
